data.title: SOFTWARE DEVELOPER
data.company: CTSI, Canarias Tecnológica y Sistemas de Información
points: Developed automation scripts for data extraction and processing, reducing manual errors and improving workflow efficiency.

Developed a full-stack web application for data management and visualization, building a RESTful API with Python (FastAPI) (documented with Swagger) and a React.js frontend to create an intuitive and responsive interface. Deployed the solution in Docker containers.
Collaborated on creating a mobile application with React Native (TypeScript) and Expo, integrating artificial intelligence services through the OpenAI API.

data.title: FRONTEND DEVELOPER
points: Developed React components with Tailwind CSS to create modern and adaptable interfaces.
Implemented new functionalities by integrating data and logic into components.
Participated in the maintenance and continuous improvement of code to ensure its quality and efficiency.
